TableField.name: BuildingID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track buildings

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for the building

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for the building

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The person with primary accountability for managing the building

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the subject matter of this record

TableField.name: BuildingTypeID
TableField.phrase: Building Type|A combined field used to describe this building type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: BuildingCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Building Category|A broad categoy used to group buildings of similar types

CodeField.name: BuildingCategory
CodeField.phrase: Building Category|A broad categoy used to group buildings of similar types

ForeignField.name: BuildingTitleGuide
ForeignField.phrase: Guidance Type|A title or phrase used to describe a building type

ForeignField.name: BuildingDescGuide
ForeignField.phrase: Guidance Description|A brief but thorough description of the building type
ForeignField.sample: A production facility used to manufacture packaged ice cream products

ForeignField.name: BuildingType
ForeignField.phrase: Building Type|A combined field used to describe this building type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: BuildingName
TableField.phrase: Building Name|Name used to identify the building

TableField.name: BuildingDesc
TableField.phrase: Building Decsription|A detailed description of the building and its purpose
TableField.sample: This is the packing house used to package and ship ready-to-eat salads.

TableField.name: Address1
TableField.phrase: Address|Physical street address of the building

TableField.name: Address2
TableField.phrase: Address|Second physical street address of the building

TableField.name: CountyID
TableField.phrase: County ID|A combined field used to track and associate counties

ForeignField.name: CountryID
ForeignField.phrase: Country|The internationally recognized name of the country

ForeignField.name: Country
ForeignField.phrase: Country|A combined field used to associate this country with another record

ForeignField.name: StateID
ForeignField.phrase: State|A combined field used to associate this state with another record

ForeignField.name: State
ForeignField.phrase: State|A combined field used to associate this state with another record

ForeignField.name: County
ForeignField.phrase: County|A combined field used to associate this county with another record

TableField.name: City
TableField.phrase: City|The city where the building is physically located

TableField.name: PostalCode
TableField.phrase: Postal Code|The numerical postal code used to direct physical mail to the building

TableField.name: BuildingClassID
TableField.phrase: Building Class|The class of building construction used to value and insure the building

CodeField.name: BuildingClass
CodeField.phrase: Building Class|The class of building construction used to value and insure the building

TableField.name: BuildingQualityID
TableField.phrase: Building Quality|The present day quality of the building

CodeField.name: BuildingQuality
CodeField.phrase: Building Quality|The present day quality of the building

TableField.name: ConstructionTypeID
TableField.phrase: Construction Type|The method used to construct the building

CodeField.name: ConstructionType
CodeField.phrase: Construction Type|The method used to construct the building

TableField.name: ConstructionYear
TableField.phrase: Construction Year|The year the building was constructed

TableField.name: BuildingSize
TableField.phrase: Building Size|The total size of the building

TableField.name: BuildSizeUnitsID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: BuildSizeUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: BuildSizeUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: BuildSizeUnits
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: LotSize
TableField.phrase: Lot Size|The total size of the lot the building sits on

TableField.name: LotSizeUnitsID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LotSizeUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: LotSizeUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: LotSizeUnits
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: FireSystem
TableField.phrase: Fire System|A summary description of the fire system/s installed in the building
TableField.sample: Install two additional time clocks to expedite the process of clocking in and out of a work shift

TableField.name: EstimatedBuildingValue
TableField.phrase: Estimated Value|The total estimated value of the building

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the building

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the building

SummaryField.name: InventoryValue
SummaryField.phrase: Inventory Value|A calculated field representing the total value of the inventory within the building. The inventory value is calculated based upon the room inventories entered into the rooms module

CalculatedField.name: TotalValue
CalculatedField.phrase: Total Value|A calculated field based on the total of the estimated building value and the inventory value

CombinedField.name: BuildingAddress
CombinedField.phrase: Building Address|A combined field used to display this buiding address when associating it with other records

CombinedField.name: TotalBuildingSize
CombinedField.phrase: Building Size|The total size of the building

CombinedField.name: TotalLotSize
CombinedField.phrase: Lot Size|The size of the lot where the building is located

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Building
CombinedField.phrase: Building|A combined field used to describe this buiding when associating it with other records

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about a building

EditScreen.name: AssetProtection
EditScreen.phrase: Audits|Associate audit items with the building

EditScreen.name: CostExposures
EditScreen.phrase: Cost Exposures|Associate cost exposures with the building

EditScreen.name: Opportunities
EditScreen.phrase: Opportunities|Associate financial opportunities with the building

EditScreen.name: BusinessConsequences
EditScreen.phrase: Consequences|Associate business consequences with the building

EditScreen.name: BusinessContinuation
EditScreen.phrase: Continuity|Associate business continuation requirements with the building

EditScreen.name: Agreements
EditScreen.phrase: Agreements|Associate business agreements and/or contracts with the building

EditScreen.name: Insurance
EditScreen.phrase: Insurance|Associate insurance policies with the building

EditScreen.name: Permits
EditScreen.phrase: Permits|Associate operating permits with the building

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities associated with the building

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the building

EditScreen.name: FileRetention
EditScreen.phrase: Files|Associate physical files and retention methods with the building

EditScreen.name: BestPractices
EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with the building

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
